title: Bellarive Discography 2009-2012 (3 Releases)
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------
BELLARIVE DISCOGRAPHY
--------------------------------------------------------------

This discography may or may not be complete.  It contains the following 3 releases...

 * 2009 - The Being Human Project
 * 2010 - Love Has Found Us - Single
 * 2012 - The Heartbeat

Bellarive is a Christian pop rock band that originated in Orlando in 2009. After one self-released EP, they signed to Sparrow Records in May 2012, and released their debut studio album The Heartbeat on June 19. This album peaked on the Billboard Christian Albums chart at No. 21 and on the Heatseekers Albums chart at No. 17.

For Him,
TorrentTracts - December 2013
